title: Bothered
description: WHEN AN IRRESISTIBLE MAN...Seth Connor might be a master carpenter, but he's got no idea he's so appealin' to the ladies. So it's up to me, Jock, to use my ghostly powers and get some confidence into the lad. Aye, his blood is sure to boil when he "accidentally" bumps into that bonny Samantha Adams!MEETS AN UNATTAINABLE WOMAN...That sassy wench was just dyin' to take a look at Seth's haunted house, and 1 know she'll soon be changing her tune about not wanting his attention! But 1'11 need all of my cunning to get her to give him everything he wants...THE UNEXPECTED HAPPENS!Those Connor brothers don't stand a chance of staying single -- once they cross the threshold and become Jock's Boys!
author: Jennifer Greene
